hero.title: Redefining Receipt
hero.subtitle: Empowering businesses and individuals with AI-powered receipt management solutions that save time and reduce errors.

story.title: Revolutionizing Receipt Management
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2023, Receipt OCR emerged from a simple yet powerful insight: businesses and individuals in Japan were losing countless hours to manual receipt processing, leading to inefficiencies and costly errors in financial management.
story.paragraph2: Our diverse team of AI visionaries, software engineers, and financial experts united to develop a groundbreaking solution. We combined cutting-edge OCR technology with deep learning algorithms specifically fine-tuned for the unique challenges of Japanese receipts, from intricate kanji characters to complex layouts.
story.paragraph3: What began as an ambitious startup has rapidly evolved into Japan's most trusted receipt digitization platform, serving thousands of satisfied users across industries. Today, we stand at the forefront of financial technology, continuously pushing the boundaries of what's possible in automated document processing.

mission.title: Driving Innovation in
mission.subtitle: We're on a mission to transform how businesses handle financial documents through cutting-edge AI and exceptional user experiences.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We push the boundaries of AI and machine learning to deliver the most accurate and efficient receipt processing solution on the market.

userCentric.title: User-Centric
userCentric.description: Our users inspire everything we build. We listen, learn, and adapt to deliver solutions that truly make a difference in their daily workflows.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.description: We help businesses save time and reduce errors through intelligent automation and streamlined processes.

globalVision.title: Global Vision
globalVision.description: While we excel in Japanese receipt processing, our technology is designed with global financial documentation in mind.

securityFirst.title: Security First
securityFirst.description: We implement enterprise-grade security measures to protect your sensitive financial data at every step.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We take pride in delivering exceptional quality and continuously improving our solutions based on user feedback.

team.title: Meet the
team.subtitle: A diverse team of experts united by a passion for innovation and excellence in financial technology.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Receipt OCR. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.subtitle: We may collect, use, store, and transfer different kinds of personal data about you, including:

technical.title: Technical Data
technical.description: IP address, browser type, time zone

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.description: How you use our website and services

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using the Receipt OCR service ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the Service.

description.title: Description of Service
description.content: Receipt OCR provides an AI-powered receipt scanning and data extraction service. The Service allows users to upload images of receipts, extract relevant information, and manage their expense data with high accuracy and efficiency.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.register: To access certain features of the Service, you must register for an account.
userAccounts.credentials: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
userAccounts.age: You must be at least 18 years old to use the Service.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.ownership: You retain ownership of any content you upload to the Service.
userContent.license: By uploading content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, and process your content to provide the Service.
userContent.responsibility: You are solely responsible for the content you upload and any consequences of posting or publishing it.

prohibitedActivities.title: Prohibited Activities
activities: Use the Service for any illegal purpose
Upload content that violates any third-party rights
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Service
Interfere with or disrupt the Service
Use the Service to create a competing product

subscriptionPayments.title: Subscription and Payments
subscriptionPayments.plans: The Service offers both free and paid subscription plans.
subscriptionPayments.billing: Paid subscriptions are billed on a recurring basis until canceled.
subscriptionPayments.refunds: All fees are non-refundable except as required by law.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties, or for any other reason.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND. WE DO NOT GUARANTEE THAT THE SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, TIMELY, SECURE, OR ERROR-FREE.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES RESULTING FROM YOUR USE OF OR INABILITY TO USE THE SERVICE.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Japan, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of any changes by posting the updated Terms on our website and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

profile.title: Profile
profile.name: Name:
profile.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This cannot be undone.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Data
howWeUse.intro: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to, including to:

purposes.title: Service Provision
purposes.description: Provide and maintain our receipt OCR service

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.intro: We've implemented enterprise-grade security measures to protect your data:

measures.title: Encryption
measures.description: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using AES-256

measures.title: Access Control
measures.description: Strict role-based access controls and authentication

measures.title: Regular Audits
measures.description: Frequent security audits and penetration testing

measures.title: Compliance
measures.description: Adherence to global data protection regulations

legalRights.title: Your Legal Rights
legalRights.intro: Under data protection laws, you have rights regarding your personal data:

rights.title: Access
rights.description: Request a copy of your data

rights.title: Restriction
rights.description: Limit how we use your data

needHelp.title: Need Help?
needHelp.intro: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, our team is here to help.
